FIGURE 15-10 Additional Guidelines for Online Brands

summary_markdown: Figure 15-10 outlines five additional guidelines for online brands, emphasizing foundational brand-building principles alongside strategic relationship and partnership management. The guidelines suggest maintaining core brand-building basics while actively cultivating a strong brand identity and generating consumer pull. Furthermore, the figure highlights the importance of judiciously selecting brand partnerships and maximizing relationship marketing efforts to enhance the brand's online presence and effectiveness. This framework presents a comparative approach, offering distinct yet interconnected strategies for online brand success.
